channel.title: Barrows shop?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to get a Barrows shop?
If anyone can link me to a tut or give me help?
People ask for barrows but I say there is no shop for it..
Please help,
Thank you

item.title: Barrows shop?
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

Open you shop.cfg

Ether make a npc spawn and make it into a shop or replace a existing shop with this code

[code]shop = 40 @red@Teh_Barrows 2 2 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4716 100 4720 100 4722 100 4718 100 4724 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4753 100 4755 100 4757 100 4759 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100

[code]

That should spawn barrows in the npc shop u chose
the shop=40 part, make sure that is the config number your shop has otehr wise you will get errors when running your server[/code][/code]

Read full topic
